You people do know about the little thing up in the right corner of the page?  It is called quality.  You click on the +1 if you like the quality.  You click -1 if you do not like the quality.  

You DO NOT click it before you have downloaded and tried the torrent. 

If the quality is very low and has many votes, it tells people to stay away from it and then the torrent dies.

BONE uploaded it because this was the only version that is out and was nearly the first person to post it.  You should be asking why 1400 of you have taken a copy and no one has come back to register the quality.
